predicate.note: Frames file for 'accustom' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

roleset.name: make used to

example.name: usually passive
example.text: But like other real estate professionals accustomed *trace* to California's quake risks, Mr. Leventhal anticipates little long-term change in the city's commercial real estate market.

example.name: a little weird with agent
example.text: Mary accustomed John to living without sleep.

roleset.note: The active is so rare (and weird) that it's almost wrong to consider this a verb any more; it might be better to consider "accustomed" as an adjective.
